thought: To craft pink_concrete_powder, I need to craft pink_dye first. The only pink_dye recipe available is pink_tulip -> pink_dye. Therefore, I will move the pink tulip to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
